row.process:
! Attach python file to prepare running :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "CREATE_VHOST", T :SET &FILENAME# = STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#, "pck_websphere_create_vhost.py")
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = 'java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#itpa-tool.jar" ' : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, 'arb -cmd execute ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&WSADMIN#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-user "&UC4RB_WAS_USERNAME#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-password "&UC4RB_WAS_PASSWORD#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-f "&FILENAME#" ') : IF &UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP# <> "localhost" : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-host "&UC4RB_WAS_HOST_TEMP#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '-port "&UC4RB_WAS_PORT#" ' ) : ENDIF ! Add list argument of python to command : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_WSADMINLIB#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_UTILSLIB#" ')
: SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_VHOST#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"&UC4RB_WAS_FAIL_IF_EXISTING#" ') : SET &UC4RB_WAS_CMD# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#, '"_PREF:&UC4RB_WAS_VHOST_ALIAS#" ')
&UC4RB_WAS_CMD#
